One-on-One Time: Isikhathi-esisodwa / ukuchitha isikhathi ndawonye (spending time together)
Can’t go to work? Schools closed? Worrie: Awukwazi ukuya emsebenzini? Izikole zivaliwe? Ukhathazekile ngemali? Kujwayelekile ukuzizwa ucindezelekile futhi ukhungathekile.
School shutdown is also a chance to make: Ukuvalwa kwesikole kuyithuba lokwakha ubudlelwano obungcono nezingane zethu nentsha.
One-on-One time is free and fun. It make: Isikhathi ndawonye sikhululekile futhi simnandi. Kwenza izingane zizizwe zithandwa futhi zivikelekile, futhi kuzikhombisa ukuthi zibalulekile.
It can be for just 20 minutes, or longer: Kungaba imizuzu engu-20, noma isikhathi eside - kuphuma kuwe. Kungaba ngesikhathi esifanayo nsuku zonke, ukuze izingane noma abantu abasha bazibheke ngabomvu.
Copy their facial expression and sounds: Kopisha ukubukeka kwabo kobuso nemisindo noma amabhlokhi we-Stack
Sing songs, make music with pots and spo: Cula izingoma, yenza umculo ngamabhodwe nezinkezo
Tell a story, read a book, or share pict: Xoxa indaba, funda incwadi, noma wabelane ngezithombe
Ideas with your teenager: Imibono nengane yakho eyeve eshumini nambili
Talk about something they like: sports,: Khuluma ngento abayithandayo: ezemidlalo, umculo, i-TV, osaziwayo, abangane
Exercise together to their favorite musi: Zivocavoce ndawonye ngomculo owuthandayo yingane yakho
Do a chore together – make cleaning and: Yenza umsebenzi ngokubambisana - yenza ukuhlanza nokupheka umdlalo!
Listen to them, look at them. Give them: Balalele, ubabheke. Banikeze ukunakwa kwakho okugcwele. Kujabulele!
Ask your child what they would like to d: Buza ingane yakho ukuthi ingathanda ukwenzani
Choosing builds their self confidence. I: Ukukhetha kwakhela ukuzethemba kwabo. Uma bafuna ukwenza okuthile okungalungile, lokhu kuyithuba lokukhuluma nabo ngalokhu. (bheka ipheshana elilandelayo)
Switch off the TV and phone. This is vir: Cisha i-TV nefoni. Lesi yisikhathi sokuba ngaphandle kwamagciwane
